name: F O C U S
description:
FOCUS is a simple, game-like, audiovisual experience created for a University project.

In Focus, the player uncovers sound sources that build up a soundscape. This is leaning into the topic of telepresence.

Use arrow keys to move, and hold space long to select options you are on!

Github: https://github.com/Hanhan139/F-O-C-U-S---Interactive-Audio-Video
